methods: StreetViewPanoramaCamera.Builder bearing(float bearing) Sets the direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north.
StreetViewPanoramaCamera.Builder orientation(StreetViewPanoramaOrientation orientation) Sets the camera tilt and bearing based upon the given orientation's tilt and bearing
